name: The Buttery Escape
description:
Made for the Jame Gam #25

Lil' Kit was about to end their late night shift when suddenly the exit was locked. Then they heard banging on one of the doors. It was the Grunch! They want their lunch! 

Guide Lil' Kit from room to room to find the ingredients. Some of them might have some unintentional side effects. Watch out for traps, and lock the doors to keep the Grunch out. Collect all the ingredients, take them to the main stove, and assemble the Butter Chicken to defeat The Grunch and Escape!

Credits

Programming:

Tenno

Imated

Everything that wasn't programming (Play tester, Music Composer, SFX Composer, Narrative Writer, Designer, Pixel Artist, Animator, and probably more. Gosh I need sleep):
